title: Crime Alert 04.15.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.15.19
description:
Police make an arrest in the cold case of a newborn found dead in a shoe box 29 years ago. Kentucky police searching for missing mother of two but instead find a fugitive. Crime in New York City dropped in all seven major categories.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
